TopicTitle: Open Multiple or Import Saved Designs?

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow space explorers!

I had a general question regarding the Vehicle Assembly Building and how it treats saved ship designs. Basically, I want to know if it's possible in the stock game to load multiple designs simultaneously. For example, let's say I make a generic lifting rocket design, and have a few designs for a final stage, such as a Lander, Probe, etc. Is there a way that I can load the Lander and add the lifting rocket to the active build session to save myself some repeated effort, or would I have to define a full rocket for each and every desired final stage?

Thanks in advance!

Edited July 26, 2013 by Vollstrecker
Question was answered.

Beingly, yes, you have to build up the full rocket becouse there is no way to import other ready-to-use dsigns, yet.

Have a look at the wiki in the "planned features" section, and read under "Spacecraft Construction".

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features

Awesome, glad to see that it's planned at least.

Thank you!

Awesome, glad to hear it's planned at least!

Thank you!

Hello. I been watching ksp videos on YouTube and i been seeing the guy load other designs. Would that be his own doing then if its not from KSP? That would be awesome if / when we can do this. Make it a bit easier
The sub assembly loader mod can do this. I haven't looked but it may or may not have updated to the current version.
